data.message: Fix hookify MCP tool hang - apply fix to marketplace hooks: Applied MCP fast-path fix to ~/.claude/plugins/marketplaces/claude-plugins-official/plugins/hookify/hooks/pretooluse.py and posttooluse.py. Previous fix was only applied to cache directory which wasn't being used. Fix adds early exit for tool_name.startswith('mcp__') to skip unnecessary rule evaluation.
data.task: Fix hookify MCP tool hang - apply fix to marketplace hooks
data.outcome: Applied MCP fast-path fix to ~/.claude/plugins/marketplaces/claude-plugins-official/plugins/hookify/hooks/pretooluse.py and posttooluse.py. Previous fix was only applied to cache directory which wasn't being used. Fix adds early exit for tool_name.startswith('mcp__') to skip unnecessary rule evaluation.
